lead_paragraph: Bigger actually may be better -- at least when it comes to hedge funds.
snippet: For hedge funds, bigger actually may be better: Bridgewater Associates, already the biggest United States-based hedge fund, pulled in more new money in the first half of 2010 than any of its rivals, according to an annual survey from AR magazine.

headline.main: For Hedge Funds, Bigger Remains Better

abstract: For hedge funds, bigger actually may be better: Bridgewater Associates, already the biggest United States-based hedge fund, pulled in more new money in the first half of 2010 than any of its rivals, according to an annual survey from AR magazine.
